Package com.link_intersystems.math

Provides mathematical components and algorithm add-ons to the java.lang.math package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Aggregate<N extends Number>
    This interface represents an aggregate function that can be applied to Numbers.
    Average<N extends Number>
    This interface represents the average of a certain amount of values.
    LinearEquation
    Interface of a mathematical linear equation.
    Max<N extends Number>
    This interface represents the maximum of a certain amount of values.
    Min<N extends Number>
    This interface represents the minimum of a certain amount of values.
    Mode<N extends Number>
    This interface represents the mode of a certain amount of values - the mode is the number that appears most often in a set of numbers.
    Sum<N extends Number>
    This interface represents the sum of a certain amount of values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBigDecimalAggregate
    Base class for Aggregate funtions that handle BigDecimal precision values.
    BigDecimalMax
    A Max with a BigDecimal precision.
    BigDecimalMin
    A Min with a BigDecimal precision.
    BigDecimalSum
    A Sum with a BigDecimal precision.
    BigIncrementalAverage
    Implementation of an incremental average calculation with no precision limits.
    CartesianPoint
    A mathematical CartesianPoint that is based on a x and y coordinate..
    IncrementalAverage
    Implementation of an incremental average calculation based on double precision.
    IntMax
    A Max with an Integer precision.
    IntMode
    A Mode with an Integer precision.
    Percentage
    Percentage calculates the ratio in relation to units.
    PointSlopeLinearEquation
    Slope–intercept based LinearEquation.
    PolarPoint
    A mathematical PolarPoint that is based on an angle (the polar axis in degree) and the distance from the center point.
    Slope
    A Slope between two points.
    TwoPointLinearEquation
    Two-point based LinearEquation.

Package com.link_intersystems.math Description

Provides mathematical components and algorithm add-ons to the java.lang.math package.
Since:
1.0.0;
